raw_body: . Dearly beloved wife of late Euty Van Dort, darling mother of Everard (US), Basil (Aus) and Benig (US), mother-in-law of Lanka, Trudy and Sharrel, grandmother of Kristina, Amanda, Arlene, Bethany, Trevine, Rebekah and Natalie, great grandmother of Kendall, Kayden, Lacienda and Leonardo, loving sister of Sheila, Barbara, Loxly and Conrad and of late George, Eva, Connie, Olean, Carmen, Doreen, Joan, Sidney and Brinsley. The remains will lie at A.F
